author: James Tanner
method: Heat the oil in a pan and gently fry the onion and garlic for 3-4 minutes until softened. Add the broccoli and stir. Pour in the hot stock and simmer for 4-5 minutes, or until the broccoli is tender.  Stir in the cream and bring to a simmer. Allow to cool slightly, then blend until smooth with a hand-blender.  To serve, pour the soup into two soup bowls and drizzle with olive oil.
ingredients: 1 tbsp olive oil, plus extra for drizzling,  ½ onion, finely chopped,  1 garlic clove, finely chopped ,  1 head broccoli, cut into small florets,  500ml/18fl oz chicken or vegetable stock,  100ml/3½fl oz double cream
